name: Alpha Sniper Shooting Strike
description:
Alpha Shooting is a military simulation game based on the world crisis.It is a tactical 1st person shooter game
in which you play the role of a special forces operative tasked with carrying out various missions. Alpha Shooting features many missions in different locations across the world, taking place outdoor environments. Before a mission starts, the player can customize their weapon load-out to suit the given operation which presents you with different tactical objectives that you must finish,such as Ambushing Combatants, Destroying an enemies on towers, Assassinating a high-value target and Shooting Bots.
